title: Bilgewater, you did it!
body: Holy crap, I actually can not wait to see what happens with the storyline in 2 days. I seriously can not remember the last time I actually cared about one of these events. Well done, so far so good.

replies.body: SO I'm not usually one for posting after reds or anything but I just needed to point out to anyone who sees this that you aren't just an Events Producer you're an Events **Bro**ducer, I just had a little laugh when I saw that and thought I'd point it out for others.
Everything with the event has been great except for the coinciding HUD update
Yeah, the Bilgewater event is pretty baller. Team Graves4life.
